content: Yes, "Enter Sandman" by Metallica is on their self-titled fifth studio album, which is also known as "The Black Album". The album was released in 1991 and features other popular tracks such as "Sad but True," "The Unforgiven," and "Nothing Else Matters." It is one of the band's most successful albums and has sold over 30 million copies worldwide. I hope you enjoy listening to the rest of the album!
